text: Podandrogyne brevipedunculata is a species of plant in the Capparaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Cleomaceae Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Podandrogyne brevipedunculata
